Package com.i2group.apollo.client

Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through the supplied Java client.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IClientFactory A factory for creating clients for the Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.
IDelpsServiceFacade A set of methods for interacting with an Intelligence Analysis Platform DELPS (data load ELP stage) solution, including the ability to synchronize Items in the ELP stage with changing data in an external source.
IDocumentDownloadServlet A method for downloading binary documents from the Intelligence Analysis Platform document store.
IDocumentUploadServlet A set of methods for uploading binary documents to the Intelligence Analysis Platform document store.
 

Class Summary
ClientFactoryFactory A factory for creating IClientFactorys that in turn can create clients for Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.client Description

Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through the supplied Java client.

Since:
3.0
